snippet: A search of an apartment in Franklin, Mass., rented by the former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez turned up ammunition and clothing that the police believe could be evidence in the murder case against him.
abstract: Search of Franklin, Mass, apartment rented by former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez turns up ammunition and clothing that the police believe could be evidence in the murder case against him.
lead_paragraph: A search of an apartment in Franklin, Mass., rented by the former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez turned up ammunition and clothing that the police believe could be evidence in the murder case against him.

headline.main: Hernandez’s Apartment Is Searched by Police
